description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver Denial of Service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43558), it is recommended to apply the following updates:

1. Download and install the following KB articles related to the updates:
   - KB5044284 for Windows 11 Version 24H2
   - KB5044285 for Windows 11 Version 23H2
   - KB5044280 for Windows 11 Version 21H2
   - KB5044273 for Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2.

2. Access the update catalog and find the respective URLs:
   - For KB5044273: [KB5044273 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - For KB5044284: [KB5044284 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For KB5044285: [KB5044285 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For KB5044280: [KB5044280 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

**Details**:
- This collection of updates addresses weaknesses identified as improper input validation (CWE-20) and out-of-bounds read (CWE-125), which can lead to a denial of service.
- Ensure your system version matches the update requirements before applying patches.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that you are running the appropriate Windows version as stated above.
- Close all applications and ensure administrative privileges are available to install updates.
